message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $18,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for this product. This is my best offer, and I'm ready to buy if you accept it.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, my initial offer was already a compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $16,000.
